#summary Brief user's guide for TortoiseSVN

See the [Development_Guide Development Guide] for installation of TortoiseSVN.

= SVN Commits =
If you have made changes to the ReactOS source and you want to send those changes upstream to the online ReactOS database, then you want to make a _commit_.  Note that commits made here only affect this database; you are not directly submitting commits to the official www.ReactOS.org/ ReactOS trunk.

To submit a commit, it is best to not have Visual Studio running.  Navigate Windows Explorer to your ReactOS source folder.  It will look something like this:
